data.actual_result: Whitespace goes through the message box end in a straight line.
data.expected_result: Whitespace gets stacked under after it hits the end of the message box like any other character.
data.short_description: Whitespace doesn't get stacked under your message or by itself in the message box after it hits the end of it, it goes through the box in a line.
data.steps_to_repro: - Spam whitespace character alone or after other characters in the message box, use copy+paste to make this easier - Observe, and optionally, try to come up with a broken combination with it
